rows.label: tev000892_MSG0001
rows.name: Oh. It's [ST:playername ]...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000892_MSG0002
rows.name: You here to stop the fight?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000892_MSG0003
rows.name: You don't even know what this bastard said to me![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000892_MSG0004
rows.name:
He was mockin' the Reclaimers, saying we're just a
buncha grave robbers and junk collectors.
Which is why I'm gonna bust his pretty little face![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000892_JNK0010
rows.name: Sympathize

rows.label: tev000892_SEL0011
rows.name: Agree with Yelv that the other man was out of line.

rows.label: tev000892_JNK0020
rows.name: Soothe

rows.label: tev000892_SEL0021
rows.name: Try to convince Yelv to calm down.

rows.label: tev000892_MSG0005
rows.name: So you DO understand![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000892_MSG0006
rows.name:
Now that my best friend's gone, you and BLADE are
all I got left.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000892_MSG0007
rows.name:
You think I'm gonna take it sitting down when someone
talks crap about the work I do? Hell no![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000892_MSG0008
rows.name: You're tellin' me to take a deep breath and relax?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000892_MSG0009
rows.name: Yeah, okay. Fine.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000892_MSG0010
rows.name: *huuuuuuff*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000892_MSG0011
rows.name: *pfffeeeeeewww*[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000892_MSG0012
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000892_MSG0013
rows.name: Aw, screw this! You're as big an idiot as he is![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000892_MSG0014
rows.name:
And now that my best friend's gone, you and BLADE
are all I got left.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000892_MSG0015
rows.name:
You think I'm gonna take it sitting down when someone
talks crap about the work I do? Hell no![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000892_MSG0016
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000892_MSG0017
rows.name: You gotta understand that, pard.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000892_MSG0018
rows.name:
Now give me one reason why I shouldn't knock out the
rest of this son of a bitch's teeth![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000892_JNK0030
rows.name: Defuse

rows.label: tev000892_SEL0031
rows.name: Invoke Eleonora's name to stop Yelv.

rows.label: tev000892_JNK0040
rows.name: Join In

rows.label: tev000892_SEL0041
rows.name: Use a nearby Skell to back Yelv up.

rows.label: tev000892_MSG0019
rows.name: Dammit, don't bring her into this! That's low.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000892_MSG0020
rows.name:
If Eleonora ever got wind of this little...incident,
I'd be scrubbin' toilets the rest of my goddamn life.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000892_MSG0021
rows.name: Fine then! Fine. You win. Fight's over.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000892_MSG0022
rows.name:
The jerk can buy me a meatloaf platter or something
and we'll call it even.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000892_MSG0023
rows.name: Whoa, let's not go overboard here![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000892_MSG0024
rows.name:
I just wanna knock out a couple of teeth,
not grind the poor guy into pudding![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000892_MSG0025
rows.name: ......[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000892_MSG0026
rows.name: Yeah, that's it. I'm callin' the whole thing off.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000892_MSG0027
rows.name:
The guy's a jerk, but that don't mean I wanna spend
my afternoon scraping him off the pavement.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000892_MSG0028
rows.name:
If walking away is what it takes to keep your bloodlust
from running wild, then consider me walked.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000892_MSG0029
rows.name:
Yeesh! Remind me never to get on your bad side,
ya crazy psycho.[ST:wait ]
